GSP33nysu__4u:3405: na vaiduṣyabhrāntyā naca vacanacāturyakudhiyā na mātsaryāveśānnaca capalatādoṣavaśataḥ /
GSP33nysu__4u:3406: paraṃ śraddhājāḍyādakṛṣi kṛtimācāryavacasi skhalannapyetasmājjagati nahi nindyo 'smi viduṣām anuvyākhyāmṛtāmbhodheḥ samutpannātinirmalā /
